answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Adam – I hope the following is helpful:
Fort Worth, TX - REQUEST FOR PROPOSALS (RFP): For Fully and Semi-Rugged Mobile Devices and Rugged Tablet Computers
http://fortworthtexas.gov/uploadedFiles/Finance/Purchasing/Bids/2011/12-0023.pdf 
Seattle, WA – RFI - Public-Private Partnership for the Purpose of Providing State-of-the-Art Wireless Mission-Critical Voice and Broadband Data Capabilities for Public Safety and General Government
http://www.seattle.gov/doit/docs/City-of-Seattle-RFI-Vendor-Session-Notes.pdf 
Kirkland, WA - REQUEST FOR PROPOSALS: Jail Cell Phone Services
http://www.kirklandwa.gov/Assets/RFP+for+Jail+Cell+Phone+Services.pdf 
Suggest you look into SmartProcure too - http://www.smartprocure.us/ 
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

answers.author: Cory Fleming
answers.text:
ICMA has partnered with our long time Strategic Partner, Esri, on a year-long effort that will result in the development of new apps and prototypes for new apps for local governments.  Please watch the ICMA website and e-newsletter for further developments.


ICMA has partnered with our long time Strategic Partner, Esri, on a year-long effort that will result in the development of new apps and prototypes for new apps for local governments.  Please watch the ICMA website and e-newsletter for further developments.

author: Adam Lehmann
text:
Good Afternoon,
Has your community developed an RFP/Q for a mobile device (phone and tablets) app?  McHenry County, Illinois is looking to develop an app of our own and we are looking for successful examples.  Please contact me directly at aflehmann@co.mchenry.il.us if you are willing to share your document. 
Thank you in advance!
Adam Lehmann
Asst. to the County Administrator
McHenry County, Illinois
815-334-0309
aflehmann@co.mchenry.il.us
title: RFP/Q for Mobile Device App
